name: What are Academy Websites?
content: Understanding the functionality of Academy Websites

steps.name: Introduction
steps.content: Academy websites are specialized online learning platforms designed to offer tailored educational experiences, particularly for companies looking to enhance the knowledge and skills of their employees or customers. These sites provide a range of learning resources that cater to various preferences and time constraints.

steps.name: Content Delivery
steps.content: Academy websites use various formats like nano-courses, bite-sized tidbits, and comprehensive courses to engage learners. This approach caters to different learning needs, offering quick overviews or in-depth explorations of subjects at one's own pace.

steps.name: Flexibility
steps.content: Academy websites make learning easy, flexible, and suitable for everyone, whether you're looking to quickly touch on a subject or get a full understanding of it.

steps.name: Business Benefits
steps.content: They're a smart way for businesses to make sure their people or customers know what they need to, in a way that's easy for them.
